code: import{createSelector}from"reselect";var cartSelector=function cartSelector(state){return state.cart;};export var selectCartItems=createSelector([cartSelector],function(cart){return cart.cartItems;});export var selectCartHidden=createSelector([cartSelector],function(cart){return cart.hidden;});export var selectCartItemsCount=createSelector([selectCartItems],function(cartItems){return cartItems.reduce(function(accumalatedQuantity,cartItem){return accumalatedQuantity+cartItem.quantity;},0);});export var selectCartTotal=createSelector([selectCartItems],function(cartItems){return cartItems.reduce(function(accumalatedQuantity,cartItem){return accumalatedQuantity+cartItem.quantity*cartItem.price;},0);});
